# The `PassInstrumentationCallbacks` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class manages callbacks registration, as well as provides a way for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation">PassInstrumentation</a> to pass control to the registered callbacks. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::PassInstrumentationCallbacks</CodeBlock>

  isLocal="true" />
</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

This class manages callbacks registration, as well as provides a way for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation">PassInstrumentation</a> to pass control to the registered callbacks.

Definition at line 75 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passinstrumentation-h">PassInstrumentation.h</a>.

### registerAfterAnalysisCallback() {#a22e96598eed6cd2b5fe9ab4a7f3a09ad}

  template={<>template &lt;typename CallableT&gt;</>}

### ShouldRunOptionalPassCallbacks {#a40bd23d8ef8f70a0041fb358982dbd8e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;llvm::unique&#95;function&lt;BeforePassFunc&gt;, 4&gt; llvm::PassInstrumentationCallbacks::ShouldRunOptionalPassCallbacks</>}>
These are only run on passes that are not required.

They return false when an optional pass should be skipped.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passinstrumentation-h/#l00176">176</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/passinstrumentation-h">PassInstrumentation.h</a>.
